metadata.title: CVE-2019-13298 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ImageMagick 7.0.8-50 Q16 has a heap-based buffer overflow atMagickCore/pixel-accessor.h in SetPixelViaPixelInfo because of aMagickCore/enhance.c error.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
